description: This source file implements C functions related to the TR-069 CWMP protocol, specifically handling session operations such as 'GetRpcMethods', 'Inform', 'TransferComplete', and 'AutonomousTransferComplete'. It includes logic for building SOAP requests, managing session states, and interacting with the device parameters and event system within a CPE device context.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CcspCwmpsoGetRpcMethods(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,SLAP_STRING_ARRAY ** ppMethodList,PULONG pulErrorCode)
methods.description: Handles the RPC to retrieve supported methods from the CPE.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CcspCwmpsoInform(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PULONG pulErrorCode)
methods.description: Handles the 'Inform' message to the ACS, gathering device info and status.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CcspCwmpsoTransferComplete(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,BOOL bIsDownload,char * pCommandKey,ANSC_HANDLE hFault,ANSC_HANDLE hStartTime,ANSC_HANDLE hCompleteTime,PULONG pulErrorCode,BOOL bAddEventCode)
methods.description: Informs the server of the completion status of a file transfer (Download or Upload).

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CcspCwmpsoAutonomousTransferComplete(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,BOOL bIsDownload,ANSC_HANDLE hFault,ANSC_HANDLE hStartTime,ANSC_HANDLE hCompleteTime,char * AnnounceURL,char * TransferURL,char * FileType,unsigned int FileSize,char * TargetFileName,PULONG pulErrorCode,BOOL bAddEventCode)
methods.description: Notifies the server of autonomous transfer completion initiated outside the ACS.

methods.name: CcspCwmpsoAutonomousTransferComplete
methods.description: Handles the completion of an autonomous transfer, builds SOAP request, manages session state, and communicates with the server.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CcspCwmpsoKicked(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * pCommand,char * pReferer,char * pArg,char * pNext,char ** ppNextUrl,PULONG pulErrorCode)
methods.description: Handles the event when the CPE is 'kicked', constructs SOAP request, manages session, and waits for response.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CcspCwmpsoRequestDownload(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * pFileType,ANSC_HANDLE hFileTypeArgArray,ULONG ulArraySize,PULONG pulErrorCode)
methods.description: Requests a file download from the server, building SOAP request, and handling response.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CcspCwmpsoDUStateChangeComplete(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hDsccReq,PULONG pulErrorCode,BOOL bAddEventCode)
methods.description: Informs the server of DU state change completion, constructs SOAP request, manages session.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CcspCwmpsoAutonomousDUStateChangeComplete(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hAdsccReq,PULONG pulErrorCode,BOOL bAddEventCode)
methods.description: Handles autonomous DU state change complete, builds SOAP request, manages session.

methods.name: CcspCwmpsoDUStateChangeComplete
methods.description: Informs the server of a DU state change completion, manages session, and builds SOAP message.

ctags.name: CcspCwmpsoAutonomousTransferComplete
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,BOOL bIsDownload,ANSC_HANDLE hFault,ANSC_HANDLE hStartTime,ANSC_HANDLE hCompleteTime,char * AnnounceURL,char * TransferURL,char * FileType,unsigned int FileSize,char * TargetFileName,PULONG pulErrorCode,BOOL bAddEventCode)

ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * pCommand,char * pReferer,char * pArg,char * pNext,char ** ppNextUrl,PULONG pulErrorCode)

ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,BOOL bIsDownload,char * pCommandKey,ANSC_HANDLE hFault,ANSC_HANDLE hStartTime,ANSC_HANDLE hCompleteTime,PULONG pulErrorCode,BOOL bAddEventCode)
